hero.headline: Fast & Reliable Mac & PC Repairs
hero.subheadline: From virus removal to hardware upgrades, we’re your one-stop IT repair service in Milton Keynes.

about.title: About 786 Computers
about.description: We offer expert repairs and IT support for both Mac and PC systems. Whether you're facing slow performance, a blue screen, or a virus issue — we've got you covered. Based in Stony Stratford, we also offer home visits across Milton Keynes.

items.title: Data Recovery & Backup
items.description: Secure your data and recover lost files.

items.title: RAM & Hard Disk Replacement
items.description: Upgrade or replace your system hardware.

items.title: Windows Re-installation
items.description: Fresh installs with all necessary drivers.

items.title: Network Setup
items.description: Home or office Wi-Fi and network configuration.

items.title: Fast Service
items.description: Same-day repairs available on most jobs.

items.title: All Hardware & Software
items.description: We support everything from RAM to routers.

items.title: We Come to You
items.description: Serving Stony Stratford & Milton Keynes at your doorstep.

quotes.name: A Local Customer
quotes.quote: Fixed my laptop the same day! Really friendly and explained everything clearly.

quotes.name: Business Client
quotes.quote: They got our office PCs back up and running within hours. Lifesaver!

items.question: Do you offer home visits?
items.answer: Yes — we’re based in Stony Stratford and cover all of Milton Keynes.

items.question: Can you fix Apple devices?
items.answer: Yes — we handle both Macs and PCs.

items.question: How much does a repair cost?
items.answer: Prices vary, but we aim to keep it affordable. Call us for a quick quote!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Need help fast? Call, email, or send us a message to get started.
